title: LAG SPIKES...
body:
This morning iv noticed a few lag issues, iv reset my modem, tested my net and my ping is normal but when i play LoL i notice a few minutes into a game i start occasionally spiking to 130-140 ping from my standard 70 ping (this happened in both games i played this morning), other people on my team were complaining about the same problem, at first it was on and off but then it became persistent and i was stuck on 130-140 ping for the rest of the game (I even tested my ping after both games and it was holding steady on 70 ping), i don't know if this is a problem with my service provider or if it's something on riots end? has anyone else noticed this problem? 

I'm with Bigpond/ Telstra.

replies.body:
Noticed that this has been a regular problem lately. been having a fair amount of games where there is someone who takes a long time to load too but doubt the problems are related. 
I am on high speed fibre but am based in NZ so expect this anyway.
